name: Binary.
description:
Binary. is a cybernetic stylish action game where you fight viruses with big swords and guns.

You are a freelance cracker who must dive into the net to fight the defenses and take control of the net.
Use stylish swordplay and gunfire to create combos and fight off viruses in spectacular fashion.




■Key Elements
Brilliant combo action.
Use your stylish swordsmanship and shooting skills to create combos.
A real-time rating system evaluates the coolness of your combos.

Various evasion actions.
You can withstand up to three attacks.
You can enjoy last-minute actions to avoid enemy bullets by using blink skills and invincibility time.

Net Strategy.
The nets must be attacked in order from the entry point.
Analyze the gimmicks in the nets to reach the goal.

Boss Battle.
In the depths of the net there is a boss that will be the final defense system.
Use the actions you learned along the way to defeat the boss.

■ Discord Server
